text: 7:31 Ofa Gami 18:21; 2 Atriviba 23:10; Jeremaia 32:35Egha me Hinomɨn danganir zarimɨn ghua ofa gamir dakozibar ingara da dɨbora ghaze, Tofet. Egh me uari uan otariba ko guiviba inigh ofan mɨn avimɨn ada tuam. Arazir me amir kamɨn nɨghnɨzitam nan navir averiamɨn itir pu. Bar puvatɨ. Kɨ kamaghɨn damuasa akatam me mɨkemezir puvatɨ.
